thread.title: Swansea City optimistic over Andre Ayew despite Ghana withdrawal
thread.title_full: Swansea City optimistic over Andre Ayew despite Ghana withdrawal

title: Swansea City optimistic over Andre Ayew despite Ghana withdrawal
text:
18:55 CET Swansea City optimistic over Andre Ayew despite Ghana withdrawal - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew 
Andre Ayew is expected to be fit for Swansea City’s Premier League clash with Stoke City despite withdrawing from the Ghana squad. 
Ayew will not feature when Ghana face Canada in Washington next week after picking up what is being described as a knock in Swansea’s draw with Tottenham last weekend. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
